p: The soil enrichment solutions were prepared using standard solutions of Cd, Ni, Pb, and As in 5% HNO 3 dissolved in ultrapure water obtained using an Elix Technology Inside with a Quantum ICP Polishing Cartridge (Milli-Q, Molsteim, France) system, with a resistivity of at least 18 MΩ·cm (equivalent to a conductivity of less than 5.6 × 10 −5 mS cm −1).
